title: OT15: Open Relationship
summary:
Key ideas:
- Author provides an open thread for readers to discuss anything they want
- Author will be off to California and attendance in a wedding
- Several commenters provide useful insights and answers

Key learnings:
- Open threads allows readers to raise and discuss various topics with the author
- Weddings are important events that people may take time off for
- Commenters on the blog can provide helpful insights and answers

Key questions:
- None mentioned in the portion of the post provided
